snippet: Jarl Mohn, who is chairman of the board of Southern California Public Radio, founded the E! cable channel earlier in his career.
abstract: NPR appoints Jarl Mohn, founder of E! cable channel, as its new chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Jarl Mohn, who is chairman of the board of Southern California Public Radio, founded the E! cable channel earlier in his career.

headline.main: NPR Picks a New Leader With Lots of Commercial Experience
headline.print_headline: New Chief Executive Is Named at NPR
